about_the_game:
A multiplayer co-op game with ragdoll mechanics and physics-based features. While the subject matter is the zombie outbreak, the gameplay focuses on skepticism and trust issues between players.

Once infected, the infection can take over the player's brain.

In a world where you can’t even trust your closest friend, you must survive in a post-apocalyptic setting ravaged by infectious diseases. It’s up to you to decide whether to rescue the people around you or raid them for supplies. But bewar even your closest teammate might be infected and keeping it a secret from you.

We are developing :

Infected players turn into Zombies and try to interfere with tasks that humans should be doing.

At the beginning of the game everyone starts as human, but over time the infection can spread. This always causes distrust among players.

Infected players can transform into different types of zombies and the more they can hide their infection from other players, the more powerful zombies they become

There are ranged and melee weapons around, but you can buy a lot of stuff with money. You can communicate with people trying to survive in the abandoned buildings around and recruit them to your team, or you can steal their supplies and kill them. Your game will be shaped entirely by your team's choices. Each game lasts 40 45 minutes.
